data.eml:eml: Description of new species of oak leaf-miners (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae), with notes on the species groups of Stigmella Schrank associated with Quercus as a host-plant

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stonis, Jonas R., Diškus, Arūnas, Remeikis, Andrius, Navickaitė, Asta, Rocienė, Agnė (2013): Description of new species of oak leaf-miners (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae), with notes on the species groups of Stigmella Schrank associated with Quercus as a host-plant. Zootaxa 3737 (3): 201-222, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.3.1
